content:
Deconstructing Domain Name Services

  • [x]y means ìinterpret x in the context of domain yî

    • Contact domain y
    • Ask y to interpret x
    • y returns a higher-order geospatial address

      • [J2.732]geo.thomas.com
      • [2223c.A3.el_segundo]geo.aero.org

  • [xk-1]...[x2][x1]x0 means ìinterpret xi i > 0 in the context of domain [xi-1]...[x1][x0]yî

    • [ënorth bookcaseí][2223c.A3.el_segundo]geo.aero.org

  • Should domain names be restricted functional programs?

    • Change the paradigm from lookup to execution
